title: [Epidemiology] Almost half of mobile phones tested at the height of the pandemic were contaminated with the SARS-CoV-2 virus |Study conducted a systematic review of 15 studies from 10 countries that examined contamination in hospital settings between 2019 and 2023

[Medicine] Post-COVID-19 syndrome or Long COVID can persist beyond 20 months post-infection and encompass the full scope of post-infectious myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome, although the symptoms are more pronounced with Long COVID, find a new prospective study
